title: When you have less than 5% health left, and you see an exclamaiton point appear above you

replies.body: More like... When you have 100% health and you see an exclamation point above you.

100%, 5%, it makes no difference when you are a freakin' 6 foot tall lion-man. 
https://cdn.makeagif.com/media/8-22-2014/_wepY7.gif
https://45.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m5qo4w3YNb1rwi5tdo1_500.gif

But then your saved by {{champion:98}} 
https://cdn-webimages.wimages.net/050db3018ecc5999599388dfb653b43d60cb37-wm.jpg
AP shen is viable right?

Most viable {{champion:98}} build right now

{{item:3089}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3089}}
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pI48vM73p20

Kshaway has the best guides
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I think? I'm really not sure, but I would think so since his abilities scale with AP. Last I played as him, anyway.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pI48vM73p20
As interesting as that was, I'm not ENTIRELY sure I believe it. That's because there is NO sign of what items are ACTUALLY being used.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pI48vM73p20

Actually,I just stop moving,accept my fate &
http://reactiongif.org/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/08/GIF-bothered-disturbed-facepalm-frustrated-Louie-CK-upset-GIF.gif

And I just watch the screen go gray..........again.

Wait, the screen going grey isn't a visual bug? What? I mean, it happened so often to me i thought it was a visual bug, as well as my death count reaching 17...

Just visual bugs {{champion:121}}
really? having your screen go gray sounds like a drag, i do it automatically when i see a rengar on the enemy team... Kappa
I have my screen plead me not to leave a match whenever there is a Rengar on the enemy team.

I just preemptively lower the color on my screen to grey when I see Rengar. 
https://i1263.photobucket.com/albums/ii633/TallyBean18/GIF/truestory.gif
And then you remember you're {{champion:245}} or {{champion:26}}. The latter is slightly less helpful because he'll just... Kill you again.
Not necessarily, just time warp and gtfo.

more like
When you're 100% hp and you die. and then you see the exclamation point above you
{{champion:8}} and {{champion:50}} be like "Oh look, my heals are coming"
Fuck yeah!
Then you remember you're playing {{champion:34}}
And then you remember that Rengar likes eggs for breakfast.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zfEbxcEU,comment-id=00140000,timestamp=2016-01-04T20:43:41.876+0000)
>
> And then you remember that Rengar likes eggs for breakfast.

Lol, with Anivia, I meant when you walk away and forget to turn off ultimate. The exclamation point has given me a tiny heart attack before realizing I'm just dumb and forgot my ultimate was left on.
{{champion:78}} I dont get it...

{{champion:266}} 

I normally Just Q my location to get a free knockup then anything after that is just Rengar healing me for the to get back into the teamfight.
Not true. You'd have to have 2 armor items just to make it through a mid/late game Rengar.

When you smite raptors there's an enemy ward detected. And there's a rengar on the other team.

On a side note, I wish the exclamation point/indicators were less similar ._.
Friend who was an ADC main decided to go into jungling for a little, the first game was against a rengar, he flashed whenever he got the ping, we laughed about it on skype.

As long as it isn't Rengar then......

{{champion:19}} I got your back.
and then you realize it was just an {{champion:28}} because you're playing Rengar so you just delete her and then she gets nerfed more
that's not how that works.
oh yeah
This is when u panic mash every key on the board...SPAM THE SKILLSHOTS, MASH ALL THE KEYS...FLASH FLASH U SUNOVABTICH!

Me? I just SS a couple creeps, find a bush, and prepare to make {{champion:107}}  feel like [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/O4f8QgxT-when-you-walk-into-a-bush-and-find-out-that-a-juggernaut-was-waiting-in-it) or at least make him do [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/Qih2QYzk-trying-to-run-away-from-nasus).
I play {{champion:75}}{{item:3078}}
{{champion:23}} My ult is still up, bring it
Infernal Nasus with ult on cd, np **thumbs up**

here's something for sound 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PnUV6Gq-wQY
{{champion:28}} +{{item:2043}}
On the bright side, Rengar wasted his ult :D

It Happens to me...then i realize something. I found a ward. Then a circle around me. 
AYYYYYYYY CHICKEN WARD FINDER{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
